about_the_game:
Crylia. Surely the smallest universe discovered to date. The Crylians are divided between 5 ethnic groups on 5 worlds: the Fafnir’s islands, the Unhnias’s mountain, the Robor’s desert, the Yongim’s halo and the futuristic capital of Cryl.

For years, a very large sporting competition has been organized through these 5 peoples. All the participants aim to win exhilarating, dangerous and wacky whole new kind of races in order to progress in the “Crylian galaxy pilot championship” with the aim of obtaining the ultimate title of champion of the galaxy!

The participants then engage in a merciless, unrestrained battle at more than 600 km/h on the most dangerous circuits ever invented, dotted with traps and surprises that will discourage more than one. They are equipped with ships full of high technology, including numerous weapons, shields and various equipment allowing them to destroy the competitors during the race. Because yes, anything goes!

Ultra-fast ships, powerful weapons, certainty of death, small chance of success, but what are you waiting for?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3 7300 / Ryzen 3 1300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 / RX 5600 XT
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 4 GO GPU RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 4060 / RX 7600
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 6 GO GPU RAM

short_description: Challenge pilots at over 600 km/h aboard supercharged ships with multiple weapons and upgrades in a new kind of futuristic races. In addition to driving, shooting will therefore be an essential skill to possess to emerge victorious in these muscular races!
